content: When it's safe to move on, go up and to the right, to find the next alcove with a Searing-Fire. This is the next alcove you'll want to jump in, then it'll be another dip with a Searing-Fire enemy
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
When it's safe to move on, go up and to the right, to find the next alcove with a Searing-Fire. This is the next alcove you'll want to jump in, then it'll be another dip with a Searing-Fire enemy
